column1:
<% form_for @message, :url => user_messages_path(@user) do |f| %>

To:
<%= f.text_field :to %> <%= error_message_on @message, :to %>

Subject:
<%= f.text_field :subject %> <%= error_message_on @message, :subject %>

Message
<%= f.text_area :body %> <%= error_message_on @message, :body %>

<%= submit_tag ""Send"" %>

<% end %>
